data.message:
for the last five years Assad has been killing syrians . while the world nations are sat is watching it , the Assad's allies such as Russia and Iran have been providing him with weapons and manpower . Aleppo has been under Assad regime's bombardments and Russian's air strikes continuously for the last 10 days . everyday there are at least victim mostly women and vulnerable children . people in every country should stand with the people of Aleppo . we asked the people to pressure their government . the universal silence not help us to stopping the killing of those civilians in Aleppo and Syria as a whole . The bombing of the aircraft kills thousands of civilians in Aleppo . Since 2011 Assad kill the Syrians. Because we asked for freedom planes bombed and destroyed our cities . Where humanity ?
#save_aleppo
#syria_is_burning_by_alasad
